Frequently Asked Questions

What is the Enneagram?

The Enneagram is a system of personality typing that describes nine fundamental personality types and their complex interrelationships. It's a powerful tool for personal growth and understanding relationships.

How do I find my Enneagram type?

While there are many online tests available, the most reliable way to discover your type is through self-reflection, reading detailed descriptions, and possibly working with an Enneagram coach.

Can the Enneagram really help my relationship?

Yes! Understanding your own and your partner's Enneagram type can provide valuable insights into communication patterns, emotional needs, and potential areas of growth in your relationship.

Do I need to be in a relationship to benefit from this site?

Not at all! The insights from the Enneagram are valuable for personal growth and self-awareness, whether you're single or in a relationship.

Are some Enneagram types more compatible than others?

While certain type combinations might have natural chemistry or challenges, any combination can work with understanding and effort. The key is awareness and willingness to grow.
